Name: Barro GT
About the game: Note: The GT version does not contain jumping like on the normal version. Barro GT is the new generation of Barro, now with a new style of race tracks but, with the good old toy car/ go kart arcade style! 26 types of cars 12 new race tracks Improved time trial (Leaderboard lap-by-lap | Fight for your position in real time!) Single player Up to 4 players local split screen Up to 20 cars on the grid
Meta Title: Barro GT: May 19, 2022, SC Jogos and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Barro GT? Check out the release date (May 19, 2022), developer insights from SC Jogos, and a complete game summary.
